Publications Should Be Extensively Used 


     "Let us now, by the wise use of periodicals and books, preach the Word with determined energy, that the world may understand the message that Christ gave to John on the Isle of Patmos. . . . Our publications should go everywhere. Let them be issued in many languages. The third angel's message is to be given through this medium and through the living teacher." --Id., p. 62.
